version_description:
Rise and swine! It's a beautiful morning, but the Bad Piggies have just one thing on their mind: FOOD! Use two ALL NEW gadgets in these 15 NEW LEVELS to track down some elusive chocolate cake!

15 new sun-drenched levels!

Record your best tri

Rise and swine! It's a beautiful morning, but the Bad Piggies have just one thing on their mind: FOOD! Use two ALL NEW gadgets in these 15 NEW LEVELS to track down some elusive chocolate cake!

15 new sun-drenched levels!

Record your best tri
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.

NEW HALLOWEEN LEVELS! 30 brand new Tusk ‘til Dawn levels filled with fresh challenges!

Bad Piggies gets a spooky update with 30 fresh new levels! The latest Tusk ‘til Dawn episode introduces you to some creepy new piggies living in a mysterious cak

NEW HALLOWEEN LEVELS! 30 brand new Tusk ‘til Dawn levels filled with fresh challenges!

Bad Piggies gets a spooky update with 30 fresh new levels! The latest Tusk ‘til Dawn episode introduces you to some creepy new piggies living in a mysterious cak
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.
We have now added support for iOS 8.
We have now added support for iOS 8.
The all-new RUFFLE video channel is here! Crazy about Bad Piggies and love gaming videos? Then get ready to ROFL with RUFFLE! Check it out now and let us know what you think.
The all-new RUFFLE video channel is here! Crazy about Bad Piggies and love gaming videos? Then get ready to ROFL with RUFFLE! Check it out now and let us know what you think.

Get ready for a ginormous NEW SANDBOX LEVEL: Little Pig Adventure! It’s the biggest sandbox yet!

Version 1.6.0 also adds a NEW PART – the gearbox. Ever wish you could put your contraptions in reverse? The pigs now have the technology. Add the gear

Get ready for a ginormous NEW SANDBOX LEVEL: Little Pig Adventure! It’s the biggest sandbox yet!

Version 1.6.0 also adds a NEW PART – the gearbox. Ever wish you could put your contraptions in reverse? The pigs now have the technology. Add the gear
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.

A new episode begins – The Road to El Porkado!
– 15 new levels – Hold on to your hats for a new episode full of slippery icy surfaces and treacherous dark caves!
– New Part – Slap the new lamp on your contraptions to see in the dark.
– New Pow

A new episode begins – The Road to El Porkado!
– 15 new levels – Hold on to your hats for a new episode full of slippery icy surfaces and treacherous dark caves!
– New Part – Slap the new lamp on your contraptions to see in the dark.
– New Pow

The Road to El Porkado continues with the discovery of a the Giant Golden Pig statue! What lies further down the road?
– 15 New Levels + 2 New Sandbox Levels in El Porkado
– New Parts! Break tiles with the Golden Pig and light your way with the Spot

The Road to El Porkado continues with the discovery of a the Giant Golden Pig statue! What lies further down the road?
– 15 New Levels + 2 New Sandbox Levels in El Porkado
– New Parts! Break tiles with the Golden Pig and light your way with the Spot

The road to El Porkado comes to an exciting end. Navigate treacherous ice and darkness on mountain peaks to make it back to sea level with the precious Golden Pig!
- 15 New El Porkado Levels
- 1 New Sandbox Level
- Introducing: Snout Coins – earn

The road to El Porkado comes to an exciting end. Navigate treacherous ice and darkness on mountain peaks to make it back to sea level with the precious Golden Pig!
- 15 New El Porkado Levels
- 1 New Sandbox Level
- Introducing: Snout Coins – earn
Made some minor fixes, but only you can stop these pigs from crashing.
Made some minor fixes, but only you can stop these pigs from crashing.

Introducing: Custom Contraptions! Find new hidden loot crates every day to get new tricked-out parts for your contraptions. Plus – throw scrap and duplicate parts into the Scrap Machine and get new, shiny parts in return!
– A HUGE amount of new parts

Introducing: Custom Contraptions! Find new hidden loot crates every day to get new tricked-out parts for your contraptions. Plus – throw scrap and duplicate parts into the Scrap Machine and get new, shiny parts in return!
– A HUGE amount of new parts

– More shiny new parts for your custom contraptions!
– Various bug fixes and improvements.

– More shiny new parts for your custom contraptions!
– Various bug fixes and improvements.

A new shipment of parts just came in for your contraption customizing pleasure!
– 15 new and extra shiny parts – now 240 parts total.
– Need a bit more scrap? Now you can buy it with coins.
– Bug fixes/improvements. We’re working to get the sprin

A new shipment of parts just came in for your contraption customizing pleasure!
– 15 new and extra shiny parts – now 240 parts total.
– Need a bit more scrap? Now you can buy it with coins.
– Bug fixes/improvements. We’re working to get the sprin

– Introducing Cake Race! Grab the cakes before your opponent and win great prizes!
– More crazy crates! Can you get the Marble Crate?
– 15 new custom parts!
